segments.text: It was fantastic ! We had such a good time . The only problem was that because it was their high season , we spent hours queuing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Peak periods always entail hours of queuing . At least you got a nice tan though !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Florida had great weather while we were there . You look tan , too . Did you go somewhere ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My friends and I just got back from Bali .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! Bali Islands have some of the best beaches in the world , don't they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we were lucky . My friend's father owns a resort on one of the islands , so we were able to stay for free .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you go diving while you were there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I took a few diving classes , but I didn't really like it , so I did snorkeling instead !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you take any pictures in the ocean ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got quite a few pictures of all different kinds of fish . I'll show them to you next time I see you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you started planning your christmas vacation yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're planning on going skiing in Switzerland . Do you ski ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but I do like snowboarding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to go skiing with us for christmas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll talk to my husband about it ; I'm sure he'll say yes ! He loves Switzerland !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is Europe's spotless land of lakes and mountains ! Let me know as soon as you can so we can get a discount .
segments.speaker: S1
